post.body: ahhhh, im being attacked by the robot vampire bear dj and random song links... ahhh
can the kindle have docs downloaded to it? say a word or text doc from your pc?
when i demand stuff, it usually ends up costing me more money. but nice to know there is a solution, however costly to me
yeah, tell them to make Spotlight work better with its intense graphics over a remote connection via dsl from home
we're just lurking, awaiting the amazing content that willl free us from the duldrums we exist in, and geta fleeting glimpse
and i always thought that the worst that could happen was to fall off a chair. never could i imagine this...
move app to left monitor, see if it crashes there
a vampire bear? cool
you are having a blast watching that, aren't ya
great deal. 2 yrs ago, i upgraded my 20 yr old skis for shaped k2. love them. old skiis cost me $5/year. new ones, probly same
http://snurl.com/9i9lg best song ever #Bacon
it must have been some sql geek post you made, that caused her concern.
haha. meaningful. i realized that one mans junk is anothers treasure. I hope.
my wife has a cousin with your name. she was reading tweets by you the other day and was thoroughly confused what you were saying
@sh3n3rd ummm cupcakes....reminds me of http://snurl.com/9i55l
my PST file died. All my subfolders gone. Rules in error. #InboxZero = 32 items. Me FAIL
been spending the last two days testing in dev environ to get GoldenGate and Native replication to not process deletes on destination
down to 166 SQL related blogs and up to December 12th in history. making progress.
blogged about last year's and next years goals. http://snurl.com/9jg4n unintended peer pressure from @sqlasylum and @peschkaj made me do it
Retweeting @UtahGov: check Utah Commuterlink for the latest traffic info before heading home today, http://www.utahcommuterlink.com
